name: Transformation Monitoring Dashboard
description: Tracks transformation runs, data quality validation, and lineage.

query.sql: SELECT transformation_name, source_table, target_table, run_time FROM system.transformation_lineage ORDER BY run_time DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT transformation_name, rule, SUM(invalid_count) AS invalid_rows FROM system.transformation_validations WHERE run_time >= current_timestamp() - INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY transformation_name, rule ORDER BY invalid_rows DESC
SELECT transformation_name, source_table, target_table, run_time FROM system.transformation_lineage ORDER BY run_time DESC
